evidence.text:
VEROCA: Thanks, Zezé, but I'm not hungry.
EUNICE: Go talk to your dad. He was worried.

EUNICE: But you don't have to choose now. Decide after the trip.
VEROCA: I've already made up my mind, Mom.
VEROCA: I can take care of myself, Mom.

VEROCA: Mom, I have to tell you something.
EUNICE: Sure I am, honey. How about you? 
EUNICE: Vera, please, the kids.
VEROCA: In London, it's in all the papers--
